mapper.select: select M.MODULE_MEMO ,M.NAVURL ,M.ID ,M.CREATE_TIME ,M.ENABLED ,M.UPDATE_TIME ,M.NEED_RIGHT ,M.MODULE_NAME ,M.UPDATER_ID ,M.SERIAL_INDEX ,M.MODULE_CODE ,M.CREATOR_ID ,M.RESOURCE_ID from SYS_RO_MODULE M where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select 1 as mtype,m.id as mid,m.id as pid,m.module_name as mname, m.navurl as murl from sys_ro_module m UNION select 2 as mtype,mr.id as mid,mr.muuid as pid ,mr.resource_name as mname, mr.resurl as murl from sys_ro_moduleres mr where mr.resurl is not null UNION select 3 as mtype,r.id as mid,r.resuu_id as pid,r.act_name as mname,r.act_url as murl from sys_ro_resact r where r.act_url is not null
select from SYS_RO_MODULE where ENABLED=1 ORDER BY SERIAL_INDEX

select M.* from ( select DISTINCT M.ID, M.MODULE_NAME, M.MODULE_CODE, M.NAVURL, M.SERIAL_INDEX, M.RESOURCE_ID from SYS_RO_PERSONROLE A left join SYS_RO_ROLERIGHT B on A.role_id=B.ROLEID left join SYS_RO_MODULERES MR ON B.RESUUID = MR.ID left join SYS_RO_MODULE M on M.ID = MR.MUUID where (A.user_id= #{pcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and B.ID is not null) AND M.ENABLED=1 union select M.ID,M.MODULE_NAME,M.MODULE_CODE,M.NAVURL,M.SERIAL_INDEX,M.RESOURCE_ID from SYS_RO_MODULE M where M.ENABLED=1 and M.NEED_RIGHT=0 ) M
ORDER BY M.SERIAL_INDEX
